data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Melo, Marcelo R. S., Espíndola, Vinicius C. (2016): Description of a new species of Characidium Reinhardt, 1867 (Characiformes: Crenuchidae) from the Chapada Diamantina, Bahia, and redescription of Characidium bimaculatum Fowler, 1941. Zootaxa 4196 (4): 552-568, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4196.4.5|53 occurrences
